com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts

Class Grammar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sendev.databasemanager.contracts.Grammar
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlterGrammar, TableGrammar

    public abstract class Grammar
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> operators
      A list a SQL operators, this is used to compare and validate operators to make sure they're valid.
      protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> orderOperators
      A list of SQL order operators, this is used to compare and validate operators to make sure they're valid.
      protected java.lang.String query
      The query SQL string, this string will be appended to and formated by the addPart and removeLast methods.

      Formats a query field, splitting it up using dot-notation.
      protected boolean isNumeric(java.lang.String string)
      Checks to see if a string is numeric, this will help determine how to format values into the query.
      protected Grammar removeLast(int characters)
      Removes the given number of characters from the end of the query string.
